meanings.definition: Having a small or narrow head
meanings.sent1: The doll had a pinheaded appearance with its tiny head.
meanings.sent2: The pinheaded statue looked out of proportion with its small head.
meanings.sent3: The pinheaded toy soldier seemed comical next to the other figures.
meanings.sent4: Her pinheaded drawing of a person made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent5: The pinheaded character in the story was easy to spot among the crowd.

meanings.definition: Showing a lack of intelligence or understanding
meanings.sent1: The pinheaded decision to jump off the roof was clearly foolish.
meanings.sent2: His pinheaded response to the question revealed his lack of knowledge.
meanings.sent3: The pinheaded mistake of wearing mismatched shoes was quickly noticed.
meanings.sent4: The pinheaded idea of using a fork to eat soup was amusing.
meanings.sent5: The pinheaded plan to swim in a frozen lake was obviously not smart.
